name: Velocity
short_description: Serve HTML content using Apache's Velocity template engine

templates.text: data class VelocityUser(val id: Int, val name: String)

documentation.description: Ktor allows you to use Velocity templates as views within your application by installing the [Velocity](https://ktor.io/docs/velocity.html) plugin.
documentation.usage:
Inside the `install` block, you can configure the `VelocityEngine`. For example, if you want to use templates from the classpath, use a resource loader for `classpath`:
```kotlin
install(Velocity) {
    setProperty(RuntimeConstants.RESOURCE_LOADER, "classpath")
    setProperty("classpath.resource.loader.class", ClasspathResourceLoader::class.java.name)
}
```

To learn more, see [Velocity](https://ktor.io/docs/velocity.html).
